titleStmt.title: The Parian Chronicle: Or the Chronicle of the Arundelian Marbles
titleStmt.author: Joseph Robertson

body.p: I have described preceding times, beginning from Cecrops, the first who reigned in Athens, to Astyanax, archon in Paros, and Diogenetus at Athens.
Since Cecrops reigned at Athens, and the country was named Cecropia, before being called Actica, from Actaeus, a native, 1318 years.
Since Deucalion reigned near Parnassus in Lycoria, Cecrops reigning at Athens, 1310 years.
